---
title: "Presentations"
---

```{python}
#| echo: false

from IPython.display import display, HTML
from jinja2 import Environment, FileSystemLoader
import json

with open("assets/academics_presentations.json", encoding="utf-8") as f:
  data = json.load(f)

environment = Environment(loader=FileSystemLoader("assets"))
template = environment.get_template("academics_presentations.html.jinja")
output = template.render(
  presentations=data["presentations"]
)
display(HTML(output))
```
